name: Haunted Lighthouse
description:
New for the Pico-8! Haunted Lighthouse! Explore a haunted lighthouse with cutting edge features such as:

Running! (Press X)

Jumping! (Press Z)

Graphics! (Use your eyes!)

Experience Level 1 as many times as you'd like! No quarters necessary.

If the game fails to load, try blowing on the cartridge (No refunds!)

Created for the Tigerdev Fall 2019 Game Jam
